document.full_text: hours after their comrades were ambushed by muammar gaddafi's forces, libyan rebels fighting an increasingly tough battle to retain control of the country's east broke out in raucous laughter as a song mocking the leader blared from a car stereo.
document.title: anti-gaddafi song, cheerleader give rebels rare comic relief
lines_and_colors: hours after their comrades were ambushed by muammar gaddafi's forces, libyan rebels fighting an increasingly tough battle to retain control of the country's east broke out in raucous laughter as a song mocking the leader blared from a car stereo.
